title: nIyE pEdai
sahitya:
nIyE pEdai mukham pArAyEl nItiyO mA karuNai
nidhi enbAr nambum anbarkku nava nidhi enbaar pashupati enbAr


anupallavi

  tAyum tandaiyum nI enru tALinait-tanjamenradaindEn
tAyumai nAyakA dInajana pAlakA vEru pughal EdayyA


caraNam    veLLiyangiri vAsanE tiru uLLam irangu mahEshanE
